item.title: How I Built My First Bot
item.description: .image-center{ display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; } Bots. Who knows what they are? At least I didn’t until sometime ago. All that came to my mind when I heard the word robot was a mechanical machine that kind of resembles humans, might work on AI, blah blah blah. Let’s leave all that science fiction influenced thoughts behind to find out how I built my first bot. Before I begin, you should probably know that I am a very big fan of custom ROMs.

item.title: Xfoliating Disingenuity
item.description: .image-center{ display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; } The idea actually reached it’s inception during my time working on the Covindia website, when I was discussing stuff with Srikar. The first thing you notice when you text him is his “substantial” use of the phrase “xD”. So yes, you can pretty much figure out the next course of action: make a bot that reacts to every xD it encounters until it annoys the sugar honey iced tea out of them.
